item.title: General availability: Bot Manager Rule Set 1.0 on regional Web Application Firewall
item.description: This rule set provides you enhanced protection against bots and provides granular control over bots detected by WAF by categorizing bot traffic as good, bad, or unknown bots.
item.atom:content: This rule set provides you enhanced protection against bots and provides granular control over bots detected by WAF by categorizing bot traffic as good, bad, or unknown bots.

item.title: Public preview: Azure Quota REST APIs to manage service limits (quota)
item.description: Use Azure REST Quota APIs to manage the service limits (quotas) of Azure Virtual Machines (cores/vCPU), Networking, Azure HPC Cache, and Azure Purview services.
item.atom:content: Use Azure REST Quota APIs to manage the service limits (quotas) of Azure Virtual Machines (cores/vCPU), Networking, Azure HPC Cache, and Azure Purview services.

item.title: Generally available: Encrypt managed disks with cross-tenant customer-managed keys
item.description: Protect your data by encrypting Premium SSD, Standard SSD, and Standard HDD managed disks with cross tenant customer-managed keys.
item.atom:content: Protect your data by encrypting Premium SSD, Standard SSD, and Standard HDD managed disks with cross tenant customer-managed keys.

item.title: Limited preview: Azure Backup support for confidential VMs using Platform Managed Keys
item.description: You can use this feature to back up confidential VMs using Platform Managed Keys.
item.atom:content: You can use this feature to back up confidential VMs using Platform Managed Keys.

item.title: Azure Resource Manager — Migrating to TLS 1.2 with Deprecation of Outdated Security Protocols
item.description: Azure Resource Manager will be deprecating support for TLS 1.1 and older in Fall 2023. To maintain an uninterrupted connection with Azure Resource Manager, update your operating systems and work environments to support TLS 1.2.
item.atom:content: Azure Resource Manager will be deprecating support for TLS 1.1 and older in Fall 2023. To maintain an uninterrupted connection with Azure Resource Manager, update your operating systems and work environments to support TLS 1.2.

item.title: Public preview: Microsoft Azure Managed HSM TLS Offload Library
item.description: Azure Managed HSM now supports SSL/TLS Offload for F5 and Nginx.
item.atom:content: Azure Managed HSM now supports SSL/TLS Offload for F5 and Nginx.

item.title: Public preview: Azure Front Door integration with managed identities
item.description: Azure Front Door Standard and Premium supports enabling managed identities for Azure Front Door to access Azure Key Vault.
item.atom:content: Azure Front Door Standard and Premium supports enabling managed identities for Azure Front Door to access Azure Key Vault.

item.title: Public preview: Azure Maps Creator feature - Wayfinding
item.description: Wayfinding in Azure Maps Creator enables you to provide your users with the shortest path between two points within a facility.
item.atom:content: Wayfinding in Azure Maps Creator enables you to provide your users with the shortest path between two points within a facility.

item.title: Public preview: Azure Front Door zero downtime migration
item.description: You can use this feature to migrate Azure Front Door (classic) to Azure Front Door Standard and Premium with zero downtime.
item.atom:content: You can use this feature to migrate Azure Front Door (classic) to Azure Front Door Standard and Premium with zero downtime.

item.title: Public preview: Upgrade from Azure Front Door Standard to Premium tier
item.description: You can now use this feature to upgrade your Azure Front Door Standard profile to Premium tier without downtime.
item.atom:content: You can now use this feature to upgrade your Azure Front Door Standard profile to Premium tier without downtime.

item.title: Azure Machine Learning—Generally availability updates for November 2022
item.description: New GA features include the ability to automate auto-shutdown/auto-start schedules, configure and customize a compute instance, seamlessly build NLP/vision models, and assess AI systems.
item.atom:content: New GA features include the ability to automate auto-shutdown/auto-start schedules, configure and customize a compute instance, seamlessly build NLP/vision models, and assess AI systems.

item.title: Azure Percept DK Retirement Announcement
item.description: Azure Percept DK and support from associated Azure services will be retired on March 30th, 2023.
item.atom:content: Azure Percept DK and support from associated Azure services will be retired on March 30th, 2023.

item.title: Azure Machine Learning—Public preview updates for November 2022
item.description: New public preview features include reading Delta Lakes in fewer steps, debugging and monitoring training jobs, and performing data wrangling.
item.atom:content: New public preview features include reading Delta Lakes in fewer steps, debugging and monitoring training jobs, and performing data wrangling.

item.title: General availability: Azure Database for PostgreSQL – Flexible Server in new China regions
item.description: Deploy Azure Database for PostgreSQL – Flexible Server workloads in two new China regions.
item.atom:content: Deploy Azure Database for PostgreSQL – Flexible Server workloads in two new China regions.

item.title: General availability: Multivariate Anomaly Detection
item.description: Multivariate Anomaly Detection will allow you to evaluate multiple signals and the correlations between them to find sudden changes in data patterns.
item.atom:content: Multivariate Anomaly Detection will allow you to evaluate multiple signals and the correlations between them to find sudden changes in data patterns.

item.title: Public preview: Azure SQL Database offline migrations in Azure SQL Migration extension
item.description: Assess, get right-sized Azure recommendations for Azure migration targets, and migrate databases offline from on-premises SQL Server to Azure SQL Database.
item.atom:content: Assess, get right-sized Azure recommendations for Azure migration targets, and migrate databases offline from on-premises SQL Server to Azure SQL Database.

item.title: General availability: Retryable writes in Azure Cosmos DB for MongoDB
item.description: Develop your applications with more flexibility with retryable writes in Azure Cosmos DB for MongoDB.
item.atom:content: Develop your applications with more flexibility with retryable writes in Azure Cosmos DB for MongoDB.

item.title: Public preview: Intra-account container copy for Azure Cosmos DB

item.atom:content: Intra-account container copy helps you create offline copies of containers within Azure Cosmos DB SQL API and Cassandra API accounts.

item.title: General availability: New cost recommendations for Virtual Machine Scale Sets
item.description: You can use new cost recommendations for Virtual Machine Scale Sets for optimization.
item.atom:content: You can use new cost recommendations for Virtual Machine Scale Sets for optimization.

item.title: Generally available: Static Web Apps support for preview environments in Azure DevOps

item.title: Generally available: Static Web Apps support for stable URLs for preview environments

item.atom:content: Use stable URLs with Azure Static Web Apps preview environments.

item.title: Generally available: Static Web Apps support for skipping API builds

item.atom:content: You can skip the default API builds via GitHub Actions and Azure pipelines.

item.atom:content: Azure Static Web Apps now supports building and deploying full-stack Node 18 applications.

item.atom:content: Azure NetApp Files for datastores is now generally available in Azure VMware Solution.

item.atom:content: You can now update SSH keys on existing AKS nodepools post deployment.

item.atom:content: The update brings enhancements to IoT Edge 1.4 and more.

item.title: General availability: Manage your Log Analytics Tables in Azure Portal

item.atom:content: Log Analytics Tables can now be managed from the tables entry of Azure Portal in Log Analytics workspaces.

item.title: General availability: Azure Automation supports Availability zones

item.atom:content: Azure Automation now supports Availability zones to provide improved resiliency and reliability to the service, runbooks and other automation assets.

item.title: Generally available: Increasing Azure Synapse Analytics Spark performance up to 77%
item.description: Faster Azure Synapse Analytics Spark performance at no cost.
item.atom:content: Faster Azure Synapse Analytics Spark performance at no cost.

item.title: Generally available: Block domain fronting behavior on newly created customer resources
item.description: All newly created Azure Front Door, Azure Front Door (classic) or Azure CDN Standard from Microsoft (classic) resources will block any HTTP request that exhibits domain fronting behavior.
item.atom:content: All newly created Azure Front Door, Azure Front Door (classic) or Azure CDN Standard from Microsoft (classic) resources will block any HTTP request that exhibits domain fronting behavior.

item.atom:content: Create applications with .NET 7 runtime to take advantage of serverless functions in Azure.

item.atom:content: Azure Static Web Apps now supports building and deploying full-stack .NET 7.0 isolated applications.

item.title: Generally available: New node sizing for Azure VMware Solution

item.atom:content: Optimize workloads with new node sizes, AV52, and AV36P, now generally available in Azure VMware Solution.

item.title: General availability: Virtual Machine software reservations

item.title: General availability: Default Rule Set 2.1 for Azure Web Application Firewall

item.atom:content: Increase your security posture and reduce false positives with Default Rule Set 2.1, now generally available on Azure's global Web Application Firewall running on Azure Front Door.

item.atom:content: Deprecation notice: transition from Azure MFA Server to Azure MFA by 30 September 2024.

item.atom:content: All IoT Hubs will be going through a service upgrade between November 2022 and April 2023 with potential impact to your IoT Hub.

item.title: Generally available: Azure Databricks SQL Pro

item.atom:content: You can now use the IP Virtual Server (IPVS) load balancer with AKS, with configurable connection scheduling and TCP/UDP timeouts.

item.atom:content: You can now more easily remove unused and vulnerable images stored on AKS nodes.

item.atom:content: Vertical Pod Autoscaler can help you reduce operational overhead, increase savings and improve stability of your cluster.

item.title: Generally available: AKS support for Ubuntu 22.04

item.atom:content: AKS will start using Ubuntu 22 instead of Ubuntu 18 as the Ubuntu version for node pools.

item.title: Generally available: Azure Storage — Attribute-based access control for standard storage accounts
item.description: ABAC for Azure Storage Blobs, ADLS Gen2, and queues is now generally available and can be used for access control by defining conditions on role-assignments based on resource and request attributes.
item.atom:content: ABAC for Azure Storage Blobs, ADLS Gen2, and queues is now generally available and can be used for access control by defining conditions on role-assignments based on resource and request attributes.

item.title: Generally available: Custom IP Prefixes (BYOIP) now available in US Government regions
item.description: The ability to bring your own public IP ranges is now available in all US Government regions. Additionally, you can now bring your own IPv6 ranges to use as Public IP Prefixes.
item.atom:content: The ability to bring your own public IP ranges is now available in all US Government regions. Additionally, you can now bring your own IPv6 ranges to use as Public IP Prefixes.

item.description: Deploy new Azure NetApp Files volumes in Azure availability zones (AZs) of your choice to support workloads across multiple availability zones.
item.atom:content: Deploy new Azure NetApp Files volumes in Azure availability zones (AZs) of your choice to support workloads across multiple availability zones.

item.atom:content: Azure Blob Storage now supports provisioning an SFTP endpoint with just one click.

item.title: General availability: Azure Premium SSD v2 Disk Storage

item.atom:content: Premium SSD v2 is the next generation Azure Premium SSD Disk Storage. It offers the most advanced general-purpose block storage solution with the best price-performance.

item.title: General availability: OpenTelemetry exporter for Azure Data Explorer

item.atom:content: Azure Data Explorer now supports ingestion of data from many receivers via the OpenTelemetry exporter.

item.title: General availability: Stream Analytics no-code editor in Event Hubs
item.description: Stream Analytics no-code editor enables you to develop a Stream Analytics job in minutes with drag and drop experience. Now, it is generally available with several new capabilities added.
item.atom:content: Stream Analytics no-code editor enables you to develop a Stream Analytics job in minutes with drag and drop experience. Now, it is generally available with several new capabilities added.

item.atom:content: Azure Arc can now provide high availability and automatic protection against zero-day or critical vulnerabilities in Azure extensions to your Arc enabled Servers

item.title: General availability: Azure savings plan for compute

item.atom:content: Today, we’re officially announcing the general availability for Azure savings plan for compute.

item.title: General availability: Zone-redundant storage support by Azure Backup
item.description: Azure Backup enables you to configure cost-efficient backups while meeting your data residency requirements.
item.atom:content: Azure Backup enables you to configure cost-efficient backups while meeting your data residency requirements.

item.title: Public preview: Exactly once delivery for Azure Data Lake Storage Gen2

item.atom:content: Stream Analytics now supports end-to-end exactly once semantics when writing to Azure Data Lake Storage Gen2.

item.title: Generally available: Azure Stream Analytics in one new region
item.description: Azure Stream Analytics is a fully managed, real-time analytics service designed to help you analyze and process fast moving streams of data.
item.atom:content: Azure Stream Analytics is a fully managed, real-time analytics service designed to help you analyze and process fast moving streams of data.

item.title: In development: Introducing ExpressRoute Metro
item.description: ExpressRoute Metro enables dedicated, private network connections between Azure datacenters and on-premises using Service providers or directly connecting to Microsoft backbone at two different edge sites in single metropolitan area.
item.atom:content: ExpressRoute Metro enables dedicated, private network connections between Azure datacenters and on-premises using Service providers or directly connecting to Microsoft backbone at two different edge sites in single metropolitan area.

item.title: Generally available: Kusto Trender
item.description: Kusto Trender is a new JavaScript client library for Kusto focused on IoT scenarios. It is now available on GitHub.
item.atom:content: Kusto Trender is a new JavaScript client library for Kusto focused on IoT scenarios. It is now available on GitHub.

item.title: Public preview: Enhanced soft delete for Azure Backup
item.description: Enhanced soft delete helps you recover your backup data after it has been deleted, giving you protection against data loss scenarios like ransomwares, malicious actors, and accidental deletes.
item.atom:content: Enhanced soft delete helps you recover your backup data after it has been deleted, giving you protection against data loss scenarios like ransomwares, malicious actors, and accidental deletes.

item.title: Public preview: Multi-user authorization for Backup vaults
item.description: Multi-user authorization provides enhanced protection for your backup data against unauthorized critical operations.
item.atom:content: Multi-user authorization provides enhanced protection for your backup data against unauthorized critical operations.

item.title: Public preview: Immutable vaults for Azure Backup
item.description: Immutable vaults helps you protect your backups against threats like ransomware attacks and malicious actors by ensuring that your backup data cannot be deleted before its intended expiry time.
item.atom:content: Immutable vaults helps you protect your backups against threats like ransomware attacks and malicious actors by ensuring that your backup data cannot be deleted before its intended expiry time.

item.title: General availability: Azure NetApp Files application volume group for SAP HANA
item.description: With Azure NetApp Files application volume group (AVG) for SAP HANA, you are able to deploy all volumes required to install and operate an SAP HANA system according to best practices.
item.atom:content: With Azure NetApp Files application volume group (AVG) for SAP HANA, you are able to deploy all volumes required to install and operate an SAP HANA system according to best practices.

item.title: Generally available: Windows Admin Center for Azure Virtual Machines

item.atom:content: Windows Admin Center for Azure Virtual Machines is now generally available for you to manage the Operating System of your Windows Server infrastructure in Azure.

item.title: General availability: Static IP configurations of private endpoints

item.atom:content: Azure private endpoint support of statically defined IP addresses is now generally available allowing you to provide static IP addresses when configuring your private endpoints.

item.title: General availability: Azure Sphere OS version 22.10 expected on October 25

item.atom:content: Participate in the retail evaluation now to ensure full compatibility. The OS evaluation period provides 14 days for backward compatibility testing.

item.title: General availability: Custom network interface name configurations of private endpoints

item.atom:content: Azure private endpoint (PE) support of custom network interface (NIC) names is now generally available. With this feature you can now deploy PE NICs without the GUID suffix.

item.description: Predictive autoscale manages and scales your virtual machine scale sets by observing and learning from historical CPU usage patterns.
item.atom:content: Predictive autoscale manages and scales your virtual machine scale sets by observing and learning from historical CPU usage patterns.

item.atom:content: This update provides the improvements for the latest version of Azure Site Recovery components.

item.atom:content: Get results from all Image Analysis visual features including Read (OCR) with only need one API call.

item.category: Azure Backup; SAP HANA Backup; HANA System Replication
item.title: Public preview: Support for HANA System Replication in Azure Backup for HANA
item.description: Now, if a HANA database fails over with HANA System Replication, backups are automatically continued from the new primary, with Azure Backup for HANA.
item.atom:content: Now, if a HANA database fails over with HANA System Replication, backups are automatically continued from the new primary, with Azure Backup for HANA.

item.title: Generally available: Control the minimum TLS version used with Azure Service Bus
item.description: Configure your Service Bus namespace to require that clients send and receive data with a minimal version of transport layer security (TLS).
item.atom:content: Configure your Service Bus namespace to require that clients send and receive data with a minimal version of transport layer security (TLS).

item.title: Public preview: Job diagram simulator in VS Code
item.description: The job diagram simulator provides a capability to visualize your Stream Analytics job’s topology and help you improve the query’s parallelism as you develop your streaming query.
item.atom:content: The job diagram simulator provides a capability to visualize your Stream Analytics job’s topology and help you improve the query’s parallelism as you develop your streaming query.

item.title: Public preview: Azure Active Directory for Azure Database for PostgreSQL – Flexible Server
item.description: Use Azure Active Directory-based authentication methods using Azure Active Directory principals, managed identities, and groups to connect and access Azure Database for PostgreSQL - Flexible Server.
item.atom:content: Use Azure Active Directory-based authentication methods using Azure Active Directory principals, managed identities, and groups to connect and access Azure Database for PostgreSQL - Flexible Server.

item.title: Azure Machine Learning—Public preview updates for October 2022/Ignite
item.description: Features include functionality to promote pipelines and models across workspaces, perform data wrangling at scale, shorten training times, and lower set-up costs with Azure Container for PyTorch.
item.atom:content: Features include functionality to promote pipelines and models across workspaces, perform data wrangling at scale, shorten training times, and lower set-up costs with Azure Container for PyTorch.

item.title: General availability: Azure Database for MySQL - Flexible Server with AMD compute
item.description: Take advantage of AMD compute for Azure Database for MySQL – Flexible Server general purpose and business critical tiers, with tuned performance out of the box.
item.atom:content: Take advantage of AMD compute for Azure Database for MySQL – Flexible Server general purpose and business critical tiers, with tuned performance out of the box.

item.title: Public preview: MySQL extension for Azure Data Studio
item.description: Connect to, query, and develop for MySQL hosted on-premises or in the cloud with the MySQL extension for Azure Data Studio.
item.atom:content: Connect to, query, and develop for MySQL hosted on-premises or in the cloud with the MySQL extension for Azure Data Studio.

item.title: Public preview: Azure Database for MySQL - Flexible Server auto scale IO
item.description: Use auto scale IO to automatically scale the IO on an instance of Azure Database for MySQL - Flexible Server to efficiently adapt for workload needs without manual intervention.
item.atom:content: Use auto scale IO to automatically scale the IO on an instance of Azure Database for MySQL - Flexible Server to efficiently adapt for workload needs without manual intervention.

item.title: Public preview: Infrastructure encryption using customer managed key for PostgreSQL – Flexible Server
item.description: Infrastructure encryption with customer managed keys adds a second layer of encryption for your data at rest using customer managed keys.
item.atom:content: Infrastructure encryption with customer managed keys adds a second layer of encryption for your data at rest using customer managed keys.

item.title: General availability: 16MB limit per document in Azure Cosmos DB for MongoDB
item.description: Develop your applications with more flexibility with a higher 16MB document limit in Azure Cosmos DB for MongoDB.
item.atom:content: Develop your applications with more flexibility with a higher 16MB document limit in Azure Cosmos DB for MongoDB.

item.title: Generally available: Azure Advisor score across all Azure regions
item.description: Azure Advisor score enables you to quickly prioritize the Azure Advisor recommendations that will have the greatest impact on your workload health.
item.atom:content: Azure Advisor score enables you to quickly prioritize the Azure Advisor recommendations that will have the greatest impact on your workload health.

item.title: Generally available: Azure Cosmos DB for PostgreSQL
item.description: Build distributed PostgreSQL applications that scale globally with cross-region read replicas with Azure Cosmos DB for PostgreSQL.
item.atom:content: Build distributed PostgreSQL applications that scale globally with cross-region read replicas with Azure Cosmos DB for PostgreSQL.

item.title: Public preview: Azure Resource Topology
item.description: Enhancing network and resource health visualization with unified and dynamic topology across subscriptions, regions, and resource groups.
item.atom:content: Enhancing network and resource health visualization with unified and dynamic topology across subscriptions, regions, and resource groups.

item.title: Public preview: ExpressRoute Traffic Collector
item.description: ExpressRoute Traffic Collector enables sampling of network flows sent over ExpressRoute Direct circuits.
item.atom:content: ExpressRoute Traffic Collector enables sampling of network flows sent over ExpressRoute Direct circuits.

item.title: Public preview: Integration of Azure Monitor Agent with Connection Monitor
item.description: Integration of Azure Monitor Agent support in Connection Monitor for monitoring connectivity to ARC enabled endpoints.
item.atom:content: Integration of Azure Monitor Agent support in Connection Monitor for monitoring connectivity to ARC enabled endpoints.

item.title: Public preview: Azure Migrate - SQL Server migration assessment for migration or modernization
item.description: Save cost in Azure for your SQL estate through the new unified discovery and assessment feature in Azure Migrate.
item.atom:content: Save cost in Azure for your SQL estate through the new unified discovery and assessment feature in Azure Migrate.

item.title: General availability: Azure Stack HCI new features release
item.description: Get the latest features release, version 22H2, for Azure Stack HCI.
item.atom:content: Get the latest features release, version 22H2, for Azure Stack HCI.

item.title: Public preview: New Azure Virtual Machine Scale Set and Spot Virtual Machines capabilities
item.description: You can now include standard VMs and Spot VMs in the same Azure Virtual Machine Scale Set. New VM-series are now supported with Virtual Machine Scale Sets flexible orchestration mode.
item.atom:content: You can now include standard VMs and Spot VMs in the same Azure Virtual Machine Scale Set. New VM-series are now supported with Virtual Machine Scale Sets flexible orchestration mode.

item.title: General availability: Azure Monitor Logs - capabilities to add value and lower costs
item.description: Azure Monitor Logs announce the general availability of capabilities that help you increase cost effectiveness.
item.atom:content: Azure Monitor Logs announce the general availability of capabilities that help you increase cost effectiveness.

item.title: Public preview: Azure Monitor application insights Java profiling, using Java Flight Recorder
item.description: Java application profiling using Java Flight Recorder (JFR) is now in preview in Azure Monitor application insights.
item.atom:content: Java application profiling using Java Flight Recorder (JFR) is now in preview in Azure Monitor application insights.

item.title: Public preview: Azure Monitor Logs - create granular level RBAC for custom tables
item.description: Setting RBAC query read action on Azure Monitor Logs table is now publicly available.
item.atom:content: Setting RBAC query read action on Azure Monitor Logs table is now publicly available.

item.title: Public preview: Azure Monitor managed service for Prometheus
item.description: Azure Monitor's new fully managed Prometheus compatible service delivers the best of what you like about open-source ecosystem while automating complex tasks such as scaling, high-availability, and long-term data retention.
item.atom:content: Azure Monitor's new fully managed Prometheus compatible service delivers the best of what you like about open-source ecosystem while automating complex tasks such as scaling, high-availability, and long-term data retention.

item.title: Generally available: Azure Monitor agent migration tools
item.description: Migration to the cost-effective, secure, performant, and manageable new Azure Monitor agent is now made easy using migration tools and helpers.
item.atom:content: Migration to the cost-effective, secure, performant, and manageable new Azure Monitor agent is now made easy using migration tools and helpers.

item.title: General availability: Confidential VM option for SQL Server on Azure Virtual Machines
item.description: Run your SQL Server workloads on the latest AMD-backed confidential virtual machines, ensuring protection of data in use.
item.atom:content: Run your SQL Server workloads on the latest AMD-backed confidential virtual machines, ensuring protection of data in use.

item.title: Public preview: Azure Managed Confidential Consortium Framework
item.description: Confidential Consortium Framework is a new Azure service that lets you use open-source for building and managing multi-party applications that require decentralized trust and governance in a trusted network.
item.atom:content: Confidential Consortium Framework is a new Azure service that lets you use open-source for building and managing multi-party applications that require decentralized trust and governance in a trusted network.

item.title: General availability: AMD-based confidential VMs for Azure Kubernetes Service

item.atom:content: Announcing the general availability of confidential node pools on Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) with AMD SEV-SNP confidential VMs.

item.title: Public preview: Azure CNI Overlay mode in Azure Kubernetes Service
item.description: Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) now offers a new network overlay mode that is more efficient in terms of IP utilization.
item.atom:content: Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) now offers a new network overlay mode that is more efficient in terms of IP utilization.

item.title: Generally available: ARM64 support in AKS
item.description: Benefit from ARM64's better price, compute performance, and lower power utilization in AKS node pools.
item.atom:content: Benefit from ARM64's better price, compute performance, and lower power utilization in AKS node pools.

item.title: Public preview: Azure Active Directory workload identity support in AKS
item.description: Workload identity provides a simpler approach for managing identities and overcomes limitations of Azure Active Directory pod-managed identity.
item.atom:content: Workload identity provides a simpler approach for managing identities and overcomes limitations of Azure Active Directory pod-managed identity.

item.title: Generally available: Windows server 2022 host support in AKS

item.atom:content: You can now benefit from the latest Windows Server 2022 features in AKS.

item.title: Generally available: 5,000 node scale in AKS

item.atom:content: Generally available: 5,000 node scale in AKS

item.atom:content: You can now get notification via Event Grid when a new Kubernetes version is available on AKS.

item.title: General availability: Azure DNS Private Resolver – hybrid name resolution and conditional forwarding
item.description: Seamlessly perform conditional forwarding from on-prem to Azure Private DNS Zones and from Azure Virtual Networks to any target DNS server.
item.atom:content: Seamlessly perform conditional forwarding from on-prem to Azure Private DNS Zones and from Azure Virtual Networks to any target DNS server.

item.title: Public preview: IP Protection SKU for Azure DDoS Protection
item.description: IP Protection is a new SKU that provides cost-effective, enterprise-grade DDoS protection for SMBs and offers the flexibility to enable protection on an individual public IP.
item.atom:content: IP Protection is a new SKU that provides cost-effective, enterprise-grade DDoS protection for SMBs and offers the flexibility to enable protection on an individual public IP.

item.title: Public preview: Azure Kubernetes Service hybrid deployment options
item.description: Azure Kubernetes Service has new hybrid deployment options.
item.atom:content: Azure Kubernetes Service has new hybrid deployment options.

item.atom:content: Day 0 support for .NET 7.0 on App Service.

item.atom:content: Go language (v1.18 and v1.19) natively supported on Azure App Service.

item.title: Public preview: Stretched clusters for Azure VMware Solution
item.description: Microsoft is announcing the public preview of stretched clusters for Azure VMware Solution, providing 99.99% uptime for customers mission critical applications.
item.atom:content: Microsoft is announcing the public preview of stretched clusters for Azure VMware Solution, providing 99.99% uptime for customers mission critical applications.

item.atom:content: We are expanding Azure Hybrid Benefit for Windows Server Software Assurance (SA) customers to easily modernize with Azure, wherever they are.

item.title: Public preview: Customer-managed keys for Azure VMware Solution

item.atom:content: Microsoft is announcing customer-managed keys for Azure VMware Solution. This new feature will support higher security for customers’ mission critical workloads.

item.title: Generally available: Azure Automanage for Azure Virtual Machines and Arc-enabled servers

item.atom:content: Announcing the general availability for Azure Automanage with expanded configuration options.

item.title: General availability: User-assigned managed identities for Azure Stream Analytics
item.description: Azure Stream Analytics currently allows you to use user-assigned managed identities to authenticate your job's inputs and outputs.
item.atom:content: Azure Stream Analytics currently allows you to use user-assigned managed identities to authenticate your job's inputs and outputs.

item.title: General availability: Use managed identities to access Cosmos DB from Stream Analytics
item.description: You can use managed identity to authenticate to your Cosmos DB output from Azure Stream Analytics.
item.atom:content: You can use managed identity to authenticate to your Cosmos DB output from Azure Stream Analytics.

item.title: General availability: Azure Data Explorer output from Azure Stream Analytics
item.description: Azure Data Explorer output from Azure Stream Analytics is now generally available.
item.atom:content: Azure Data Explorer output from Azure Stream Analytics is now generally available.

item.title: Public preview: Azure Elastic SAN
item.description: Azure Elastic SAN is industry's first fully managed storage area network (SAN) offering in the cloud providing an end-to-end experience similar to on-premises SAN.
item.atom:content: Azure Elastic SAN is industry's first fully managed storage area network (SAN) offering in the cloud providing an end-to-end experience similar to on-premises SAN.

item.title: Public preview: Azure Container Apps Azure Monitor integration
item.description: Azure Container Apps now support using Azure Monitor to send your logs to additional destinations.
item.atom:content: Azure Container Apps now support using Azure Monitor to send your logs to additional destinations.

item.title: Generally available: Dapr support for managed identity in Azure Container Apps
item.description: Container Apps now provides support for using Dapr with Managed Identity.
item.atom:content: Container Apps now provides support for using Dapr with Managed Identity.

item.title: Public preview: Support for hybrid rendering with Next.js apps
item.description: Azure Static Web Apps now supports zero configuration deployment and hosting of hybrid-rendered Next.js applications.
item.atom:content: Azure Static Web Apps now supports zero configuration deployment and hosting of hybrid-rendered Next.js applications.

item.title: Generally available: Dapr secrets API support
item.description: You can now use Dapr secrets APIs from your Azure Container Apps and leverage Dapr secret store component references when creating other components in the environment.
item.atom:content: You can now use Dapr secrets APIs from your Azure Container Apps and leverage Dapr secret store component references when creating other components in the environment.

item.title: Public preview: Physical job diagram for Stream Analytics job troubleshooting
item.description: The physical job diagram provides rich, instant insights to your Stream Analytics job to help you quickly identify the causes of problems when you troubleshoot issues.
item.atom:content: The physical job diagram provides rich, instant insights to your Stream Analytics job to help you quickly identify the causes of problems when you troubleshoot issues.

item.title: Public preview: Native delta lake output connector
item.description: You can now configure a Stream Analytics job to write streaming data to either a new or an existing delta lake yable in Azure Data Lake Storage Gen2.
item.atom:content: You can now configure a Stream Analytics job to write streaming data to either a new or an existing delta lake yable in Azure Data Lake Storage Gen2.

item.category: Azure Backup; SAP HANA Backup; HANA Snapshot

item.atom:content: Protect your large HANA databases in Azure Virtual Machines and recover them instantly with Azure Backup for HANA backint certified solution which now supports HANA snapshots.

item.atom:content: Features include controlling/customizing a model’s training code and using Python functions to develop tasks.

item.atom:content: Integration service environment in Azure Logic Apps will be retired on 31 August 2024.

item.atom:content: You can now use the new optional parameter "intent" to specify the VM sizes and zone intended for the proximity placement group.

item.title: General availability: Simplified disaster recovery for VMware machines using Azure Site Recovery

item.atom:content: Today we’re officially announcing the general availability of a simpler, more reliable, and modernized way to protect your VMware virtual machines using Azure Site Recovery, for recovering quickly from disasters.
